message: You are my hero! Thanks :) Luca

Hi Omab it could be nice to add the optional support for the mobile device in the facebook backend to show the authentication page in the right format. In particular I  modified the args = {'client_id': settings.FACEBOOK_APP_ID,
                'redirect_uri': self.redirect_uri,'display':'touch'} in the  auth_url method of the FacebookAuth class and as you can see I only added the variable touch. It could be nice to allow the user to pass this parameter. What do you think?
Support added on this changeset https://github.com/omab/django-social-auth/commit/51a67a6f3afcb4f819b1197f30a1056fa8237f1b, check the doc for usage details.
